daniela.bio: Ms. Costea has more than 25 years of experience in legal professions, serving as a prosecutor in Romania between 1994-2004, and subsequently as an attorney in Switzerland and Romania. She advises and represents clients in various legal fields, particularly in civil law, criminal law, and international private law.
